headline: Interpublic Launches Agentic Systems for Commerce to Help Brands Accelerate and Sustain Profitable Sales Growth Across Channels
summary: New York, NY, July 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) today announced the launch of Agentic Systems for Commerce (ASC), a new offering designed to help brands manage the scaled and complex commerce ecosystem in ways that are not possible without automation and artificial intelligence. To optimize commerce performance, ASC leverages Interpublic’s proprietary agentic system and is powered by data from Intelligence Node, the transaction data company Interpublic acquired earl

headline: Interpublic Group Earnings Beat Estimates in Q2, Revenues Slide Y/Y
summary: IPG posts 23% y/y EPS growth in second-quarter 2025. Yet, revenues slip 6.7% and margins face sharp y/y declines.

raw.headline: Interpublic Group Earnings Beat Estimates in Q2, Revenues Slide Y/Y
raw.summary: IPG posts 23% y/y EPS growth in second-quarter 2025. Yet, revenues slip 6.7% and margins face sharp y/y declines.

headline: IQVIA Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates in Q2, Rise Y/Y
summary: IQV tops second-quarter 2025 estimates, with earnings up 6.4% and revenue rising 5.5%. It cuts the 2025 EBITDA guidance.

raw.headline: IQVIA Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates in Q2, Rise Y/Y
raw.summary: IQV tops second-quarter 2025 estimates, with earnings up 6.4% and revenue rising 5.5%. It cuts the 2025 EBITDA guidance.

headline: Accenture Deepens Banking Capabilities in Malaysia with Acquisition of Aristal
summary: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia, July 22, 2025--Accenture has acquired Aristal, a Malaysia-based consulting and digital transformation firm with deep expertise in financial services.
